titles: Brief reflections on the Earl of Castlehaven's memoirs of his engagements and carriage in the wars of Ireland by which the government at that time, and the justice of the crown since, are vindicated from aspersions cast on both.
author: Borlase, Edmund, d. 1682?
notes: Epistle to the King signed E. B.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
